fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player, dealing to them a :RosaBonk: attack.
- Defend a player, giving them :RosaBonk: defense
- :RosaBonk: a player, preventing them from taking an action this night and next night
- Stay home, dealing a :RosaBonk: attack to all your visitors
- :RosaBonk: a player, placing them in prison.
- :RosaBonk: a imprisoned player, dealing to them a :RosaBonk: attack

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a :RosaBonk: is before or after attack or defense, it is replaced with unstoppable and powerful respectively.
- You may multitask
- You may communicate with imprisoned players anonymously
- Imprisoned players may not take their action and all visits against them will fail.
- At the start of the game, if this role spawns, the host must use :RosaBonk: in every private channel
- None of the effects with :RosaBonk: in them can fail
